name: Safari Park Wild Animals Police Truck Rescue 3D - Real Cargo Transport Simulator
name_original: Safari Park Wild Animals Police Truck Rescue 3D - Real Cargo Transport Simulator
description:
Transport wildlife creatures to wonder zoo in police realistic truck and rescue their burning cages. Become responsible police officer & catch crazy animals before they harm any innocent citizen. Play the role of real rescue officer and extinguish fire burning zoo animals’ cages. Protect them before they are wounded.

Forget all other ambulance rescue & truck simulation when you have got the latest pro police vehicle simulator. Download & enjoy extreme cargo stunts with police outstanding truck transporter.

Give us feedback and reviews for further improvement and better games.
